scripts.postinstall: git clone -b 1257-fix-memory-saturation-with-many-node-images git@github.com:boogheta/sigma.js.git && npm run prebuild
scripts.prebuild: cd sigma.js && npm install && npm run prepare && cd -
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && kotatsu build client --config ./webpack.config.js --typescript index.ts --production -o build/bundle.js
